casebody.data:
Birge, Respondent, v. Berlin Iron Bridge Co., Appellant. (Supreme Court, General Term, Third Department. March 15, 1892.) Action by James C. Birge against the Berlin Iron Bridge Company.

Argued before Mayham, P. J., and Putnam and Herrick, JJ.

*944Ho opinion. Motion for reargument of appeal denied. For decision on appeal, see 16 N. Y. Supp. 596. See, also, 15 N. Y. Supp. 969; 17 N. Y. Supp. 684, 946.
